item.description: Enjoy a coffee or some tea and discuss the book "The Compass of Zen" by Zen Master Seung Sahn (Shambhala Dragon Editions). A native of South Korea, the late Master Seung Sahn was the founder of the Kwan Um School of Zen. In New England his teachings are carried on by the Providence Zen Center and the Cambridge Zen Center. Note: As this is not a B & N program, the book store staff will not know about the group. Just look for a table in the cafe with a stack of Buddhist books, and a sign that says "Book Discussion." Hope to see you there!
item.name: Buddhism Book Discussion - Manchester Buddhism Sangha
